songs.title: So Playa
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
Baby Im So Playa
Feelin' So Dull Tonight Dull Tonight Baby Im So Playa
Ima Be Cold As Ice Till The Day That I Die And I Can Do I Can Do Anything That I Like Cause Ima Trill Yeah Im Trill You Niggas Ain't Fuckin' With Me
[Verse 1]
Okay You Know It's Young Bangs In This Bitch Nineteen Shootin' At Your Girl I Don't Need A Gun Rage
Get Her To The Crib I Ain't Worried Runnin' Trains But If She's A Dime Piece We Gon' Make A Chump Change Mane
Im So Fuckin' Playa I Should Have My Own Game Called Im So Fuckin' Playa That I Got My Own Game Im In My Own Line Doin' My Own Thang And I Don't Smoke Blunts Bitch I Blow The Whole Train
I'm Thinkin' Like A Lighter I Create My Own Fire There's A Bitch Up My Sleeve I Don't Think You Wanna Try Her Got Your Girl Goin' Live Cravin' For My Oscar Mayer That's A Wiener Scratch The E And Add A N And That's A Winner No Begginer Keep Throwin' J Cutler In The Winner Johnny Knocks Dogged In Them Like My Body Was A Kennel Bill O'reilly Plain Sinner
A Factor With A Pencil So Clear Stevie Wonder Get The Picture
[Hook]
Baby Im So Playa Feelin' So Dull Tonight Dull Tonight Baby Im So Playa Ima Be Cold As Ice Till The Day That I Die And I Can Do I Can Do Anything That I Like Cause Ima Trill Yeah Im Trill You Niggas Ain't Fuckin' With Me
[Verse 2]
Knock Knock Who's There Money's There That's Who I Don't Need Money Just A Honey I Can Rap To
Donate My Feet To The East Like Its Charitable And Put The Whole World On My Back Like A Parachute
I Be Doin' Things That You Niggas Wouldn't Dare To Do
You Be On That Drug Free Tip So Im Darin' You To Go Take A Risk Futurerisk Hit The Pif Captain Kirk Star Trekin' And Im For Real Like The Cliff
So Real No Clips From A Movie Never Trip I'm A Studio Nigga I Don't Need A Road Trip But I Still Got Will With The AM From The Pill Put Sex In Front Of That And Procrastination Kills Nigga Im The Fuckin' Deal Like Milf When I Spill All On A Nigga Track Call Me Kirkochelle Got A Poster Off This Chick She Don't Really Fuck With Males On A Sunday I Tell Her Looky Here
[Hook]
Baby Im So Playa Feelin' So Dull Tonight Dull Tonight Baby Im So Playa Ima Be Cold As Ice Till The Day That I Die And I Can Do I Can Do Anything That I Like Cause Ima Trill Yeah Im Trill You Niggas Ain't Fuckin' With Me
[Hook Again]
